trans-unit.source: Defines the settings for the bootstrapper build operation.
trans-unit.target: 定义引导程序生成操作的设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file to be installed after the bootstrapper installs the required components.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在引导程序安装必需组件后安装的文件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to be installed after the required components are installed.
trans-unit.target: 要在安装所需组件后安装的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file to be installed after the bootstrapper installs the required components.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在引导程序安装必需组件后安装的文件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the file path is relative to the bootstrapper source path.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，文件路径是相对于引导程序源路径。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to null if no application is to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性为 null，如果没有应用程序要安装的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application to be installed after the bootstrapper installs all required components.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在引导程序安装所有必需组件后安装的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application to be installed after the required components are installed.
trans-unit.target: 要在安装必需组件后安装的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application to be installed after the bootstrapper installs all required components.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在引导程序安装所有必需组件后安装的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to null if no application is to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性为 null，如果没有应用程序要安装的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a component runs with elevated permissions when it is installed on a target computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，以指示在将组件安装到目标计算机上时是否以提升的权限运行该组件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the installed component runs with elevated permissions; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用提升的权限运行已安装的组件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set in the project file, but it is not exposed in the MSBuild schema.
trans-unit.target: 可以在项目文件中，设置此属性，但它未公开 MSBuild 架构中。

trans-unit.source: A component runs with elevated permissions when it writes a registry key or is installed to the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 在写入注册表项或安装到全局程序集缓存时，使用提升的权限运行组件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are installing assemblies to the global assembly cache, you have to set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果程序集安装到全局程序集缓存中，你必须将此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expected source location when the bootstrapper is published to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 当引导程序发布到网站时，获取或设置预期源位置。

trans-unit.source: A URL that represents the expected source location when the bootstrapper is published to a Web site.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URL，它在引导程序发布到网站时表示预期源位置。

trans-unit.source: If you specify <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings.ApplicationFile%2A>, the bootstraper will be published to the location specified by this value.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings.ApplicationFile%2A>，引导程序将发布到此值指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings.ComponentsLocation%2A> is set to <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ComponentsLocation.Relative>, required component files will be published to a location relative to this value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings.ComponentsLocation%2A>设置为<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ComponentsLocation.Relative>，所需组件文件将发布到相对于此值的位置。

trans-unit.source: Set this value to null if Setup.exe is not to be published to the Web.
trans-unit.target: 设置此值为 null，如果 Setup.exe 无法发布到 Web。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the installation location for bootstrapper components.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引导程序组件的安装位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ComponentsLocation" /> installation location for bootstrapper components.
trans-unit.target: 引导程序组件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ComponentsLocation" /> 安装位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location to which the bootstrapper will copy components if <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings.ComponentsLocation" /> is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ComponentsLocation.Absolute" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings.ComponentsLocation" /> 设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ComponentsLocation.Absolute" />，则获取或设置引导程序要将组件复制到的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location to which the bootstrapper will copy components if <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings.ComponentsLocation" /> is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ComponentsLocation.Absolute" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BuildSettings.ComponentsLocation" /> 设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ComponentsLocation.Absolute" />，引导程序要将组件复制到的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bootstrapper components will be copied to the build output directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示引导程序组件是否将复制到生成输出目录。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the bootstrapper components will be copied to the build output directory; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果引导程序组件将复制到生成输出目录，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the bootstrapper components will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，引导程序组件将复制。

trans-unit.source: If `false`, the files will not be copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果`false`，将不会复制文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture identifier to use if the LCID identifier is not available.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 LCID 标识符不可用时要使用的区域性标识符。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the culture identifier to use if the LCID identifier is not available.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值，表示 LCID 标识符不可用时要使用的区域性标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture identifier specifying the culture for which the bootstrapper is built.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置区域性标识符，它指定针对其生成引导程序的区域性。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the culture identifier specifying the culture for which the bootstrapper is built.
trans-unit.target: 表示该区域性标识符的整数值，该标识符指定针对其生成引导程序的区域性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file location to which to copy output files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要将输出文件复制到的文件位置。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the file location to which to copy output files.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示要将输出文件复制到的文件位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the product builders to use for generating the bootstrapper.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于生成引导程序的产品生成器。

trans-unit.source: A collection of product builders (<see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ProductBuilderCollection" />) to use for generating the bootstrapper.
trans-unit.target: 用于生成引导程序的产品生成器的集合 (<see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ProductBuilderCollection" />)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL for the Web site that contains support information for the bootstrapper.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含引导程序支持信息的网站的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL for the Web site that contains support information for the bootstrapper.
trans-unit.target: 包含引导程序支持信息的网站的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bootstrapper performs XML validation on the component manifests.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示该引导程序是否对组件清单执行 XML 验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the bootstrapper performs XML validation on the component manifests; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果引导程序对组件清单执行 XML 验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the bootstrapper validates component manifests; if `false`, the bootstrapper does not validate component manifests.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，引导程序验证组件清单; 如果`false`，引导程序不会验证组件清单。
